SealWelcomeAboard: SEAL: Welcome aboard captain. All systems online.
SealSubEasterEgg: SEAL: Crazy? I was crazy once. They locked me in a room. A rubber room. A rubber room with rats. Rats make me crazy.
SealCrushDepth: SEAL: Warning: maximum depth reached! Hull damage imminent!
SealDamageNotification: SEAL: Warning: external hull damage detected.
SealWelcomeAboardNegative: SEAL: Welcome aboard Captain, some systems need attention.
SealNoPower: SEAL: Warning: emergency power only. Oxygen production offline.
Tooltip_SealHullModule1: Increases safe diving depth. Does not stack.
Tooltip_SealHullModule2: Increases safe diving depth considerably. Does not stack.
Tooltip_SealHullModule3: Increases safe diving depth to maximum. Does not stack.
Tooltip_SealSolarChargeModule: Recharges the Seal's power supply while in sunlight. Can stack.
Tooltip_SealThermalChargeModule: Recharges the Seal's power supply while in close proximity to excessive heat. Can stack.
Tooltip_SealSpeedModule: Increases engine power, providing extra thrust for increased speed. Can stack.
